expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Requires 10 Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 4 times. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Hexaburn.NAME: Hexaburn
expansioncontent:Hexaburn.DESCRIPTION: In !M! turns, deal !D! damage to a random enemy 6 times. NL Scales with Strength.

expansioncontent:InvincibleStrength.NAME: Invincible
expansioncontent:InvincibleStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 expansioncontent:Invincible. NL If you already had expansioncontent:Invincible, it lasts another turn instead.

expansioncontent:HyperBeam.NAME: Automa-Beam
expansioncontent:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put a *Void on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
expansioncontent:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you are below half HP, Gain 2 Strength.
expansioncontent:LastStand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you are below half HP, Heal !M! and gain 2 Strength.

expansioncontent:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
expansioncontent:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.NAME: Awaken
expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.DESCRIPTION: When you would die, or at the end of combat, heal !M! HP instead and lose this buff.

expansioncontent:Chronoboost.NAME: Chrono-Boost
expansioncontent:Chronoboost.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength for every 12th card you play.
expansioncontent:Chronoboost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength. NL Gain 2 Strength for every 12th card you play.

expansioncontent:ShapePower.NAME: Shaper's Blessing
expansioncontent:ShapePower.DESCRIPTION: Choose - Gain !M! Strength or !DM! Plated Armor.

expansioncontent:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare Crush
expansioncontent:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and *SLIME *CRUSH. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:PrepareCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and *SLIME *CRUSH+. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.NAME: Study the Spire
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random *Boss card at the start of your next !M! turns. They cost 0.
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a random Upgraded *Boss at the start of your next !M! turns. They cost 0.

expansioncontent:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 *Boss cards to gain. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Upgraded *Boss cards to gain. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.NAME: The Evil Within
expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a random *Boss card. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a random Upgraded *Boss card. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.NAME: Knowing Skull
expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Spend HP to *Wish *for *Souls, *Potions, or a *Colorless card. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:SuperGoopSpray.NAME: Goop Spray
expansioncontent:SuperGoopSpray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! expansioncontent:Goop and 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

expansioncontent:ChargeUp.NAME: Resilient Plate
expansioncontent:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:ChargeUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!.

expansioncontent:SuperTaunt.NAME: Taunt
expansioncontent:SuperTaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

expansioncontent:Torchfire.NAME: Wildfire
expansioncontent:Torchfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique debuff on the enemy.

expansioncontent:Flail.NAME: Flail
expansioncontent:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 2 times. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:BloodySacrifice.NAME: Bloody Sacrifice
expansioncontent:BloodySacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Lose HP equal to !M! % of your max HP. NL Gain 1 Ritual. Exhaust.
